summary:
A revamped favoritesmenu file configured to work with Better Sorting and Categorized Favorites Menu. 
v1.6 Add compatibility and proper sorting of Deadly Dragon spells
v1.4 Layout adjusted for better access of all favorites
v1.2 added support for Crafting 300
v1.1 now compatible with Jaysus\' Swords.
descriptionHtml:
First, I personally use JSwords, Crafting300, Better Sorting, and Deadly Dragons as these are the only mods I think that I have that changes names from the Vanilla list.  I would GREATLY appreciate any simple help such as if anyone who finds stuff missing from my intentional lists to either post a message in my discussion or PM me names (as you see them in your list) that you find in the Others category instead of the proper one :)


Below is the description of the mod.  For those who use deadly dragons there are new spells that I have to add and sort once I get them, patience please :)

=========================================================================================
I want to use this segment to explain how to counter the wretched steam mannerisms of botching up the load order in the following steps

- Run BOSS.  

- Copy paste the list into both your plugins.txt and loadorder.txt.  Keep in mind that unrecognized esm files will appear under unrecognized mods so copy and paste those under your other esm files.

- For those that use Wrye Bash like myself, put a # in front of the merged esp files

- Save then right click each file, go to properties and check them as read only.

- Now steam won\'t *&#$ up your load order :)


I also want to add another \"fixer\" for a problem I have been experiancing with Skyrim.  It seems that when changing zones from interior to exterior cells, my game will suddenly drop to a dismal 9-14fps which isn\'t really playable.  This can happen with either just 1 transition from an inside to outside cell or after several.  I did much internet searching and found a solution (FINALLY).  If anyone else is experiancing this, simply press Ctrl+Alt+Delete, then press escape after you hit the welcome screen.  This seems to clear up the ram, or cache or whatever is causing the problem :)
=========================================================================================


The interface works well for 1680x1050 resolution and should be fine with larger resolutions as well.

I haven\'t updated the screenshot since 1.4 as the layout has stayed the same.

This config is not class specific and should work well for any style of play.  The only one problem I can\'t fix is the Invisibility spell appearing under the Utility section of potions as both the potion and spell have the same name. *FIXED

Potions are divided into the following sections;Health, Magicka, Vigor, Fortify Stats, Fortify Skills, Resistances, Soups & Stews, Utility, Poisons and Other.

Magic falls into 2 different lists.  Destruction gets its own list with spells being separated by element in matching colored sub-lists.  Everything else falls under Support Magic.

WHAT IS NEEDED
You will of course need Headbomb\'s awesome Better Sorting Mod
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2730

And lastly, Favemenumodder\'s Categorized Favorites Menu
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862

OPTIONAL
The font I am using is Valister\'s Main Font Replacement - Magic Card Font
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=95

INSTALLATION:
simply extract to steamaapps/common/skyrim or let Nexus Mod Manger do that for you :)

On a separate note, when you open the file, you will have to use the exact spelling of items when entering them into the equipment sets.

If you guys have any suggestions, please let me know :)

CHANGELOG
Version v1.7
    added latest Deadly Dragon Spells
    added minor powers from the mods Fix Targets Stats, Deadly Dragons, Make New Home, and  Summon IMAGINATOR Helper

Version v1.6

    added compatibility for Deadly Dragon spells
    added compatibility for PISE, headbomb\'s crafting overhaul

Version V1.5

    minor fixes such as placing some missed items in the proper lists eg Krosis mask now in apparel list

Version V1.4

    fixed the 1.3 screw ups, sorry for any that downloaded it
    Much improved layout
    Seperated Shouts and Powers into different headings
    Seperated magic into support and destruction categories. Destruction magic also sorted by element.

Version v1.3

    Seperated Shouts and Powers
    Tweaked weapons and poison lists to display properly for longer lists

Version V1.2

    added support for Crafting 300

Version v1.1

    - Made Compatible with Jaysus\' Swords, should have all of his weapons appear in proper lists
    - Added vanilla Daedric Artifacts and Uniques to filters for proper display in lists
    - Small change to apparel list from v1.0, should now scroll properly

Allow discussion of your file
Allow users to start new comment topics
Allow users to tag your file
author: Megiddon
